---
title: "Accordion - Synchronized Mode"
filters: [details]
---

In synchronized mode, all details elements in a group open and close together.

## Configuration

```markdown
::: {.details summary="Chapter 1" group="chapters" accordion-mode="synchronized"}
Notes for chapter 1.
:::

::: {.details summary="Chapter 2" group="chapters" accordion-mode="synchronized"}
Notes for chapter 2.
:::
```

## Demo

Click any section - all sections in the group will toggle together.

::: {.details summary="Chapter 1: Introduction" group="notes" accordion-mode="synchronized"}
- Overview of the topic
- Key terminology
- Learning objectives
:::

::: {.details summary="Chapter 2: Methods" group="notes" accordion-mode="synchronized"}
- Research methodology
- Data collection
- Analysis techniques
:::

::: {.details summary="Chapter 3: Results" group="notes" accordion-mode="synchronized"}
- Key findings
- Statistical analysis
- Data visualization
:::

## Global Configuration

Set synchronized mode as the default:

```yaml
---
extensions:
  details:
    interactive:
      accordion-mode: "synchronized"
---
```

Then simply use the `group` attribute:

```markdown
::: {.details summary="Section A" group="mygroup"}
:::
```
